plugin.title: Facebook connect
plugin.description: Quick access to the website account are using Facebook account
plugin.author: Alex

plugin.install: $sql = "ALTER TABLE `". RL_DBPREFIX ."accounts` ADD `facebook_ID` VARCHAR(25) NOT NULL"; $GLOBALS['rlDb'] -> query($sql);
